thread.section_title: OnDeck Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OnDeck | ondeck.com
thread.title: Mark S Chadwell
thread.title_full: OnDeck reviewed by Mark S Chadwell

author: Mark S Chadwell
title: Mark S Chadwell
text:
The only thing that needs to be changed with the program is the first repayment. The bank wire showed up in my account on Tuesday and on Thursday the first payment was drafted out of my account. Thats a little too soon, cant do much with the cash in two days. At least 2 weeks or maybe 4 weeks would help somebody a lot.
Other then that everything was painless and fast.
I will use again.
